channel.title: FlamScape 317 Client and Server Comming out soon!
channel.description:
Hello all Runescaper's and RuneScape devolopers!
The new FlamScape Client is comming your way! Witch means that there are lots of features!
[size=14pt][b]~~Fetures in the FlamScape Client~~[/b][/size] -Additional Commands that include ::talkon YOURTEXT - reapets message, good for buyying or selling... ::talkoff - turns off message repeater ::pctime - checks how much time is left in Jail... ::pass NEWPASS - changes you password ::players - view how many players are online. ::bwarn - Warns a person of being banned ::jwarn - Warns a person of being jailed ::yell - Yell something out for all display ::noclip - this will ban you... ::givestat - Gives you state information ::setlevel - Sets the level (mod & admin) ::giveitem PLAYERNAME ITEM AMOUNT - gives player an item ::kick PLAYERNAME - Kicks player... ::donaterzone - zone for donaters ::adminzone - teles you to adminzone ::ksk99j7 - autoer, teleport to playername. ::resetdrops - resets drops ::donationinfo - find donationinfo ::commands - shows commands ::admin commands - shows admin commands ::players - shows number of players ::owner - becomes owner? ::resetdef - resets deffence state ::resettatk - resets attack ::resetstr - resets strength ::telej - teleports you to jail ::removedonor - removes doner info. ::claim - claims ::unban PLAYERNAME - Unbans player. ::unmute PLAYERNAME - unmutes player. ::ipban PLAYERNAME - ip bans player ::unjail PLAYERNAME - unjails player ::onpickup - pickups enabled ::offpickups - pickups disabled ::spec - resets special ::mypos - Tells where you position is... ::PNPC ID - sets player to ID ::hail - TEXT= ALL HAIL +[PLAYERNAME]+ teleports everyone to your player ::npcreset - resets npcs ::master - makes states master ::tele COORD1 COORD2 - teleports you to the COORD's ::banuser USERNAME - bans player ::copy PLAYERNAME - copys player wearing ::jail PLAYERNAME - jails player ::xteletome PLAYERNAME - teles player to you ::update - updates server ::xteleto PLAYERNAME - teleports you to player ::bank opens up bank ::clearinv - clears inventory ::pickup ITEM AMOUNT - pickups item [b]Now that was the Commands now for the screenshots![/b]
[img]http://flam-scape1.webs.com/screenshots/0004.png[/img] Logging in Screen!
[img]http://flam-scape1.webs.com/screenshots/0006.png[/img]
Homes - EdgeVille
[img]http://flam-scape1.webs.com/screenshots/0007.png[/img] Armour Shop! [img]http://flam-scape1.webs.com/screenshots/0008.png[/img] Donator Shop!!!
More to come with time!!! ~Owner James = tehjamdude [img][/img]

item.title: FlamScape 317 Client and Server Comming out soon!
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

hawkgames:

was this made out of paradiseX source?

No it was used with FernanScape v2

Read full topic
item.source: FlamScape 317 Client and Server Comming out soon!

item.title: FlamScape 317 Client and Server Comming out soon!
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

Hello all Runescaper’s and RuneScape devolopers!

The new FlamScape Client is comming your way! Witch means that there are lots of features!

[size=14pt]Fetures in the FlamScape Client[/size]
-Additional Commands that include
::talkon YOURTEXT - reapets message, good for buyying or selling…
::talkoff - turns off message repeater
::pctime - checks how much time is left in Jail…
::pass NEWPASS - changes you password
::players - view how many players are online.
::bwarn - Warns a person of being banned
::jwarn - Warns a person of being jailed
::yell - Yell something out for all display
::noclip - this will ban you…
::givestat - Gives you state information
::setlevel - Sets the level (mod & admin)
::giveitem PLAYERNAME ITEM AMOUNT - gives player an item
::kick PLAYERNAME - Kicks player…
::donaterzone - zone for donaters
::adminzone - teles you to adminzone
::ksk99j7 - autoer, teleport to playername.
::resetdrops - resets drops
::donationinfo - find donationinfo
::commands - shows commands
::admin commands - shows admin commands
::players - shows number of players
::owner - becomes owner?
::resetdef - resets deffence state
::resettatk - resets attack
::resetstr - resets strength
::telej - teleports you to jail
::removedonor - removes doner info.
::claim - claims
::unban PLAYERNAME - Unbans player.
::unmute PLAYERNAME - unmutes player.
::ipban PLAYERNAME - ip bans player
::unjail PLAYERNAME - unjails player
::onpickup - pickups enabled
::offpickups - pickups disabled
::spec - resets special
::mypos - Tells where you position is…
::PNPC ID - sets player to ID
::hail - TEXT= ALL HAIL +[PLAYERNAME]+ teleports everyone to your player
::npcreset - resets npcs
::master - makes states master
::tele COORD1 COORD2 - teleports you to the COORD’s
::banuser USERNAME - bans player
::copy PLAYERNAME - copys player wearing
::jail PLAYERNAME - jails player
::xteletome PLAYERNAME - teles player to you
::update - updates server
::xteleto PLAYERNAME - teleports you to player
::bank opens up bank
::clearinv - clears inventory
::pickup ITEM AMOUNT - pickups item
Now that was the Commands now for the screenshots!


Logging in Screen!

Homes - EdgeVille


Armour Shop!

Donator Shop!!!

More to come with time!!!
~Owner James = tehjamdude

Read full topic
item.source: FlamScape 317 Client and Server Comming out soon!
